Kyani recomienda consultar a su médico antes de consumir cualquier producto. El consumo de este producto es responsabilidad de quien lo recomienda y de quien lo usa.

DISCLAIMER: Results aren't typical or guaranteed and require hard work and skill. By referring customers, Business Partners can earn meaningful supplemental income based on actual product sales. Most people join only to purchase amazing products for personal use and earn little or no income.
